name: Soldier of Fortune (English Software)
overview: Gone with the Wind (Via Col Vento) is appropriate as for all creatures you face, a single shot is enough! You have five lives to sustain you, the war is nearly over, but you have to keep going and have only your courage by your side as you wander in the endless caves using your survival skills to keep you safe from the pitfalls of nature. This immense clay cave full of burial niches, tunnels, crumbling stairs and terrifying creatures is proof the war has not ended for you. But fate is not completely against you because in the cave, scattered here and there are various types of weapons and some creatures require a certain type of weapon to best destroy. Published in Italy under Via Col Vento in Linguaggio Macchina C64/ZX n.14 (Febbraio 1986) and as L'Errante in Poke n.10 (febbraio 1986).
